text:
'Tucker Carlson Tonight' Exclusive: Milo: Mainstream Media Legitimizes Violence Against Conservatives Published February 2, 2017 Facebook 0 Twitter 0 livefyre 0 Email Print 

Breitbart editor Milo Yiannopoulos reflects on the riots that led to the cancellation of his speech at U.C., Berkeley, mainstream media creating environment for violence against conservatives, his new book, hate speech and more. #Tucker
